ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_Baton_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Riot Baton
ThingDef.description: A low-lethality weapon used by the Wolfein for controlling riots and violent outbreaks. Crafted from durable materials, it's designed to suppress unrest without causing fatal harm.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_HeavyPowerAxe_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Heavy Power Axe
ThingDef.description: A colossal melee weapon occasionally deployed in close-quarters combat, utilizing advanced propulsion systems to deliver devastating kinetic strikes.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_HeavyMachete_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Heavy Machete
ThingDef.description: Though cumbersome and unwieldy to operate, this monolithic blade becomes a terrifying force in the hands of skilled wielders, capable of cleaving through armor with brutal efficiency.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_AlloySabre_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Alloy Sabre
ThingDef.description: A seamless fusion of tradition and modernity, forged with Wolfein's advanced metallurgy and precision engineering to deliver surgical cutting precision and tactical striking power for versatile close-quarters engagements.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_AlloyDagger_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Alloy Dagger
ThingDef.description: The standard-issue weapon of the Wolfein armed forces. Its modular, detachable blade design ensures that Wolfein elite soldiers remain sharp—until victory or death.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_HeavySabre_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Heavy Sabre
ThingDef.description: A two-handed colossal blade with surprisingly manageable weight, delivering lethality comparable to bulkier melee weapons while maintaining sustained thrusting efficiency through its unique aerodynamic profile, earning the "Utility Knife" moniker among operatives.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_SimpleDagger_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Simple Dagger
ThingDef.description: A ground iron shard with cloth-wrapped hilt, crudely assembled yet prevalent among Wolfein outcasts - those wolf-like vagrants prowling civilization's fringes.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_SimpleSpear_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Simple Spear
ThingDef.description: A straight wooden shaft wrapped with leather at the grip and tipped with a dagger - this rudimentary yet timeless design remains the Wolfein's most ancient and pragmatic weapon. After all, classics never fade.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_SimpleMace_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Simple Mace
ThingDef.description: Whether salvaged from sports arenas or back-alley brawls, this baseball bat wrapped in razor wire now serves as a brutally pragmatic tool for "wilderness tourism".\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_RebelAlloyDagger_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Alloy Dagger
ThingDef.description: The standard close-combat sidearm carried by Wolfein Resistance fighters, optimized for covert strikes and reliable armor-piercing efficiency.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_AIPTChainSaw_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein AIPT Chain Saw
ThingDef.description: A heavy-duty weapon engineered by Wolfein Anomaly Intervention Teams for purging flesh-based entities, featuring armored housing with hyper-frequency vibrating teeth to rapidly disassemble non-humanoid biological structures.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_RebelPowerHammer_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Heavy Power Hammer
ThingDef.description: Designed to allow resistance army soldiers to engage against the MegaCorp special forces wielding heavy power axes. Although the lack of composite alloys in its construction makes it clearly inferior to a heavy power axe, it remains a formidable weapon in the hands of a seasoned veteran.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Melee_PrototypeGunlance_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Prototype Gunlance
ThingDef.description: A Wolfein prototype gunlance designed to address the close-combat soldier’s inability to quickly handle large numbers of targets. Engineers preserved the weapon’s excellent slashing performance while fitting it with an explosive buckshot launcher. The explosive buckshot it fires can deal devastating damage to large swarms of lightly armored units at close range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_HomemadePistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Homemade Pistol
ThingDef.description: A crude, single-shot improvised firearm with rudimentary construction. Though vastly inferior to manufactured weapons, its compact design and ease of concealment make it a desperation-sidearm for close-quarter emergencies.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_HeavyPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Heavy Pistol
ThingDef.description: A rarely encountered high-caliber sidearm manufactured by MegaCorp, delivering exceptional firepower at the cost of poor ergonomics and punishing recoil.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_MachinePistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Machine Pistol
ThingDef.description: A compact machine pistol optimized for close-quarters engagements, offering full-auto firepower with greater portability than standard submachine guns.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_Pistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Pistol
ThingDef.description: A sleek, user-friendly pistol commonly issued to Wolfein corporate security and law enforcement personnel, prioritizing reliability in high-stress scenarios.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_RebelPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Pistol
ThingDef.description: The standard-issue compact semi-automatic sidearm for Wolfein ResistanceArmy, providing reliable rapid-response capability in close-quarters engagements.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_HG_ChargeRapidFirePistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Rapid-Fire Pistol
ThingDef.description: MegaCorp-issued sidearm for armed forces, integrating charge-cell technology to unleash rapid bursts of high-pulse energy projectiles with armor-shredding capability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SMG_LightSubmachineGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Light Submachine Gun
ThingDef.description: While falling short in range and stopping power compared to standard arms, its compact frame and blistering fire rate make it ideal for close-quarters urban engagements.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SMG_RebelSubmachineGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Submachine Gun
ThingDef.description: The standard urban guerrilla warfare equipment for Wolfein ResistanceArmy, featuring a short barrel and collapsible stock design to achieve high-rate suppressive fire and rapid tactical repositioning in confined spaces.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SMG_ChargeSubmachineGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Submachine Gun
ThingDef.description: A compact submachine gun incorporating charge-cell technology, designed for confined spaces with enhanced close-quarters burst potential through rapid energy projectile saturation.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_HomemadeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Homemade Rifle
ThingDef.description: A rough-hewn weapon crafted from scrap materials, retaining core firing functionality though its crude manufacturing process compromises accuracy and effective range compared to industrial-grade rifles.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_Carbine_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Military Carbine Gun
ThingDef.description: A versatile combat solution for wilderness operations and urban warfare, delivering balanced ballistic profile with enhanced barrel harmonics for mid-range precision and controlled stopping power.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_AssaultRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Military Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: A multi-role combat system engineered for diverse tactical environments, achieving optimal balance between effective range, shot grouping consistency, and cyclic rate, complemented by high-capacity magazine options.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_RebelAssaultRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: The primary standard-issue weapon of the Wolfein Resistance, featuring a modular composite construction and an adaptive gas system, ensuring stability in all-terrain combat and compatibility with multiple types of ammunition.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_ChargeAssaultRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Assault Rifle
ThingDef.description: Utilizes charge-cell technology, equipped with a precision targeting system and stable firing performance, commonly deployed by MegaCorp tactical task forces.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_ChargeCombatRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Combat Rifle
ThingDef.description: This weapon utilizes charge-cell ammunition to deliver superior firepower and extended range compared to standard assault rifles, but trades these advantages for significant recoil and reduced magazine capacity.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_AR_AIPTStungun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein AIPT Stun Rifle
ThingDef.description: A MegaCorp experimental weapon that uses electromagnetic force between rails to accelerate projectiles to incredible speeds, designed to destroy anomalous objects. The specially designed projectiles are capable of causing temporary disorientation to the target upon impact.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RF_HomemadeBolt-actionRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Homemade Bolt-action Rifle
ThingDef.description: A primitive-looking firearm constructed from scavenged materials. Its rudimentary sights maintain basic accuracy, with a stock wrapped in coarse leather.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RF_SniperRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: A weapon specifically engineered by MegaCorp for long-range precision engagements, featuring exceptional accuracy and extended effective range for surgical target elimination.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RF_ChargeSniperRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: A sniper rifle enhanced with charge-round technology, offering exceptional penetration and precision, effectively engaging heavily armored targets at long range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RF_HighAccuracyCannon_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein High-Accuracy Cannon
ThingDef.description: In the mechanoid wars, the frontline’s intense demand for single-soldier-portable, high-precision direct-fire weaponry has long plagued MegaCorp’s departments. Although the Wolfein possess greater physical strength than humans, it is clearly insufficient for an individual to bear and operate a large-caliber cannon. The recent successful development of heavy-equipment adaptation kits tailored for the Wolfein has turned the single-soldier high-accuracy cannon—once thought to be mere fantasy—into a practical reality.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RF_RebelSniperRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Sniper Rifle
ThingDef.description: The core long-range precision strike equipment of the Wolfein Resistance, specifically designed for behind-enemy-lines infiltration and high-value target elimination missions.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_MG_Minigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Minigun
ThingDef.description: A high-capacity, rapid-fire support weapon with formidable firepower offset by its cumbersome weight, typically deployed by Wolfein heavy weapons teams to deliver sustained suppressive fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_MG_RebelLightMachineGun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Light MachineGun
ThingDef.description: The backbone weapon for squad fire support in the Wolfein Resistance, featuring an open-belt feed system and a quick-change barrel design to meet the dual tactical needs of mobile assault and static defense.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_MG_ChargeMinigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Minigun
ThingDef.description: A rapid-fire rotary weapon utilizing charge-cell ammunition to unleash devastating suppressive fire against massed enemies, though requiring extended spin-up and cooldown cycles.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_MG_TwinChargeMinigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Twin-Charge Minigun
ThingDef.description: The project faced wide controversy at launch — cost, mechanical complexity, cooling, and more. But once prototype firing tests began, critics fell silent faster than the target drones went down.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SG_Shotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Long Barreled Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A hunting-oriented scattergun with extended barrel length for tighter pellet spread and increased stopping power, optimized for medium-range engagements.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SG_AutomaticShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Automatic Shotgun
ThingDef.description: Excels in close-quarters combat with rapid shell ejection capability, delivering wide-area devastation through high-volume buckshot saturation.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SG_ChargeAutomaticShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Charge Automatic Shotgun
ThingDef.description: An automatic shotgun utilizing charge-round technology, effective against heavily armored targets and ideal for close-quarters suppression combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_SG_RebelShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A specialized breaching weapon for close-quarters combat in the Wolfein Resistance, featuring a compact pump-action mechanism and a jam-resistant rifled barrel design.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Launcher_GrenadeLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Grenade Launcher
ThingDef.description: A portable weapon used by the Wolfein to launch explosive projectiles, offering convenient mobility and formidable blast power, making it the preferred choice for engaging medium-range group targets.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_Longbow_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Longbow
ThingDef.description: Crafted from meticulously selected wood and imbued with artisan craftsmanship, this traditional weapon pales in effectiveness compared to modern firearms.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_PrototypeRailBalista_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Prototype Rail Ballista
ThingDef.description: Projectiles drawn by a bowstring and accelerated by electromagnetic propulsion carry extremely high kinetic energy and penetrating power, allowing them to pierce any armor or flesh along their flight path; at close range or with a favorable angle of incidence they can even tear through and penetrate relatively thin walls.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_MissileLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Missile Launcher
ThingDef.description: An anti-vehicle rocket launcher capable of tearing through the heavy armor of the Machina. Due to its relatively high cost, its deployment across units remains limited.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: W_Weapon_RebelMissileLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Wolfein Rebel Missile Launcher
ThingDef.description: A makeshift anti-vehicle rocket launcher used by the Resistance. While it lacks the precision and reliability of MegaCorp models, its low cost and simple design make it a genuine threat to armored units.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
